COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa
STRING: A few days had passed since then, but I still hadn't fully
recovered from the cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110
STRING: But I was able, at least, to get out of bed, make my own
meals, and do the washing up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126
STRING: Phorni did almost everything else for me, but preparing
food seemed impossible for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c
STRING: Even so, having someone nearby helped calm me, and I
felt I'd get better in no time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152
STRING: And right now, Phorni was by my pillow, looking
worriedly at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184
STRING: [Chris] “I said I'm fine...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a2
STRING: [Phorni] “...If you say so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b8
STRING: [Chris] “It's thanks to you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea
STRING: [Phorni] “...There you go again...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x214
STRING: Phorni looked away to hide her embarrassment, then
she remembered something and spread her wings in
the direction of the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x232
STRING: [Phorni] “Hold on a second.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264
STRING: She didn't have that far to fly from the bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a
STRING: But then Phorni walked to the kitchen, where she put a
towel under running water, wrung out the excess and
came back to the bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a
STRING: She used to place the towel on my forehead without
doing that, which I scolded her for countless times.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b0
STRING: But now, she had learned the refined art of wrapping
the towel around the faucet and twisting it with her
whole body, so I wouldn't drown in water like before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d0
STRING: ...Although the problem was that the whole process
took over ten minutes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e6
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30c
STRING: [Phorni] “Hold on a second...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x322
STRING: She was in the middle of climbing up the kitchen
counter with the towel on her back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x338
STRING: I'd tried telling her that I'd do it myself, but Phorni
opposed vehemently, so I gave up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34e
STRING: I was simply happy that Phorni was willing to do things
for me, and Phorni was also happy to be able to do
something for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36e
STRING: And so I watched Phorni trying her very best.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x384
STRING: And I closed my eyes in order to get the excessive sleep
that my weakened state demanded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3bc
STRING: In that state, time passed unexpectedly quickly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c8
STRING: I realized a cold towel had been placed on my
forehead, and Phorni was singing a lullaby to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3de
STRING: It was probably because I'd fallen asleep without
realizing it, but when I opened my eyes I felt a little
embarrassed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f4
STRING: I was way past the age for lullabies, but Phorni always
sang songs like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42c
STRING: [Phorni] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x442
STRING: When I opened my eyes, Phorni stopped singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44e
STRING: [Chris] “What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x480
STRING: [Phorni] “I just heard a knock.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ae
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... You're right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e0
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm... What should we do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f6
STRING: [Chris] “I can make my way to the door. I'm still in my
sleepwear, but it'll be fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x516
STRING: I got up and headed to the front door, somewhat
unsteadily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x548
STRING: [Phorni] “You sure you're okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55e
STRING: [Chris] “I said, I'm fine...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x582
STRING: I wasn't exactly that fine, but it wasn't anything for
Phorni to worry about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x598
STRING: Even though I was already making her worry beyond
what was necessary.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b4
STRING: [Chris] “Coming! Who is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ca
STRING: Standing in front of the door, I called out to the person
outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e0
STRING: There was no way I could open the door in my
sleepwear, so I'd have to see who it was first.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f6
STRING: The answer came right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60a
STRING: [Asino] “Chris, it's me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x620
STRING: [Chris] “...Asino.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x636
STRING: What wind blew him here, I wondered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x642
STRING: Asino came here twice, maybe three times a year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x64e
STRING: And he hadn't entered the room yet, not once.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65a
STRING: Anyway, Asino wouldn't care that I was in my
sleepwear, so I opened the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b6
STRING: [Asino] “Morni...what's up with the clothes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6cc
STRING: [Chris] “Obviously, I just woke up...or not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6fe
STRING: [Asino] “What else could it be? Anyway you could've
changed, at least.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x71e
STRING: [Chris] “Actually, I caught a cold. Can we talk inside?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75a
STRING: [Asino] “Ah... Yeah. Sorry about that. Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x770
STRING: [Chris] “Come on in. I'll stay in bed, if you don't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ac
STRING: [Asino] “Of course, you don't have to ask.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c2
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e6
STRING: We went inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f2
STRING: Phorni had heard us talking, it seemed, and she
sounded worried.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x824
STRING: [Phorni] “Don't talk for too long now, Asino.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x848
STRING: Of course, Asino couldn't hear her, but I could cut the
conversation short.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x85e
STRING: Unable to hide my joy at hearing her say that, I got into
bed quite cheerfully.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x890
STRING: [Asino] “Somehow, you seem quite chirpy for someone
with a cold.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a6
STRING: [Chris] “Is that so? Well, the worst part of it is over. I
just have to rest now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ce
STRING: [Asino] “I see. You really need to take care of yourself
now, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ee
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I guess, thanks. Well? What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x90c
STRING: [Asino] “Hmm? Ah, I just wanted to talk to you about
something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x922
STRING: [Chris] “I can't go out, so we'll have to talk here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x954
STRING: [Phorni] “Which means it can't take too long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x980
STRING: [Asino] “Well, I don't plan on staying that long. I just
wanted to find out who your partner was.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a0
STRING: [Chris] “Partner, huh. What about you, Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d2
STRING: [Asino] “Me? Don't have one yet. Anyway, I asked first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f2
STRING: [Chris] “...Hmm, that's a tough one... But I can say that
I've made up my mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa2e
STRING: [Asino] “Oh, I have to guess, huh... It has to be Tortinita.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa44
STRING: [Chris] “Sadly, no.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa76
STRING: [Asino] “What, it's not her?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8c
STRING: [Chris] “...It's not a student, so you'll probably never
guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac8
STRING: [Asino] “...That's rare.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xade
STRING: [Chris] “Well, it is kinda unheard of.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafc
STRING: [Asino] “That's true, but I meant the fact that you found
such a person.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1c
STRING: [Chris] “It was...a little complicated.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb3a
STRING: [Asino] “A girl?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb50
STRING: [Chris] “You could say that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6e
STRING: [Asino] “Is she cute?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb84
STRING: [Chris] “Very.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb6
STRING: [Phorni] “Ch-Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf6
STRING: [Asino] “Looks like I got worried for nothing. Anyway,
hope you two get along.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, we'll do that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3e
STRING: [Asino] “...You've changed a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc54
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? Is that so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc72
STRING: [Asino] “What about Arietta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc88
STRING: [Chris] “It's okay. Don't worry about that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcba
STRING: [Asino] “...Hmm. There's something strange about this
new, confident Chris. Can't believe you used to look
troubled every time Arietta was mentioned.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce4
STRING: [Chris] “I guess you could say that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd02
STRING: [Asino] “That reaction too... But anyway, your cold
doesn't seem that bad either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd22
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd40
STRING: [Asino] “Well then, I'll head home. Don't have anything
else to do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd56
STRING: [Chris] “Did you really come here just to ask about that?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd74
STRING: [Asino] “I was gonna ask you to come grab a bite, but I
thought better of it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd8a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, that's not going to happen. But thanks for
the thought.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb2
STRING: [Asino] “Wouldn't hurt if you did the asking next time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc8
STRING: [Chris] “Got it. See you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde6
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah, later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe08
STRING: I had to lock the door, so I got out of bed and saw
Asino out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe3a
STRING: [Asino] “By the way, does Tortinita know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe50
STRING: [Chris] “... Uh, no, not yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe82
STRING: [Asino] “You should let her know soon. She's really
worried about you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea2
STRING: [Chris] “I know. I'll talk to her soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed4
STRING: [Asino] “Well, doesn't matter to me anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf08
STRING: With that, Asino left the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf14
STRING: When he said it didn't matter to him, he often meant
the opposite.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2a
STRING: That ambiguity was one of the things I liked about
Asino, so I never pressed the issue.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf40
STRING: It was easy to understand once you got used to it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf70
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, that was faster than expected.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf86
STRING: When I returned to the bed, Phorni said that quite
cheerfully.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb8
STRING: [Phorni] “But yeah, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfce
STRING: [Chris] “You have to tell her everything. What you
remembered, and the letter too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfee
STRING: Natale was such a difficult time, I wasn't able to write a
reply.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xffa
STRING: I had left things alone until I remembered everything,
and even when I did, the only thing I could do was to
leave it alone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1010
STRING: There couldn't be any more letters from Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101c
STRING: At first, I'd had my doubts about that letter, but I soon
found the answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1032
STRING: The only person who'd do such a thing was Tortinita.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x103e
STRING: I asked Phorni, and she said that that was probably the
case.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1054
STRING: [Chris] “When I go to school, I'll try talking to her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1086
STRING: [Phorni] “You'll go after you get better. Maybe I should
go, too...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109c
STRING: [Chris] “Nah, I'm only going to talk to Torta. I'll come
back right away, and then we can have our ensemble.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d8
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris... You say such embarrassing things with
a straight face.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f8
STRING: [Chris] “That's because I like to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112a
STRING: [Phorni] “To...perform ensembles?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1140
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1172
STRING: [Phorni] “Ugh, you're unbelievable.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1196
STRING: And we both laughed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a2
STRING: The fact that I remembered everything meant our
relationship had inevitably changed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b8
STRING: I still called her Phorni, but we did so with the full
knowledge of the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ce
STRING: And while everything looked bright on the surface, the
future wasn't quite as rosy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e4
STRING: However, all that we could do right now, was to give
the best performance ever at the graduation recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11fa
STRING: My initial goal remained unchanged, we were going to
perform at the recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1206
STRING: I no longer cared whether others could hear Phorni's
voice or not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121c
STRING: I was going to be with her from now on, absolutely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1228
STRING: But actually, we both knew our time together was
coming to an end, and were both desperate to have a
final memory to share.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1248
STRING: That's why I was heading toward my goal instead of
abandoning it, and creating a bright, if imaginary, future.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125e
STRING: That was our best option right now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126a
STRING: We would give the best performance of our lives.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1276
STRING: That was all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1282
STRING: [Chris] “I'll get better by the day after tomorrow, after
that, let's start practicing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12be
STRING: [Phorni] “Yes... Yes!”
